body:
Running 
```
spack install --test=root valgrind
```
results in
```
==> valgrind: Executing phase: 'autoreconf'
==> valgrind: Executing phase: 'configure'
==> valgrind: Executing phase: 'build'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j4' 'check'

13 errors found in build log:
     4137    depbase=`echo fldcw_check.o | sed 's|[^/]*$|.deps/&|;s|\.o$||'`;\
     4138    /home/gitlab-runner/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/gcc -DHAVE_CONFIG_H -I
             . -I../../..  -I../../.. -I../../../include -I../../../coregrind -
             I../../../include -I../../../VEX/pub -I../../../VEX/pub -DVGA_amd6
             4=1 -DVGO_linux=1 -DVGP_amd64_linux=1 -DVGPV_amd64_linux_vanilla=1
                 -I../../.. -I../../../include -I../../../coregrind -I../../../
             include -I../../../VEX/pub -I../../../VEX/pub -DVGA_amd64=1 -DVGO_
             linux=1 -DVGP_amd64_linux=1 -DVGPV_amd64_linux_vanilla=1   -ffrees
             tanding -Xassembler -I../../../exp-bbv/tests  -MT fldcw_check.o -M
             D -MP -MF $depbase.Tpo -c -o fldcw_check.o fldcw_check.S &&\
     4139    mv -f $depbase.Tpo $depbase.Po
     4140    depbase=`echo complex_rep.o | sed 's|[^/]*$|.deps/&|;s|\.o$||'`;\
     4141    /home/gitlab-runner/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/gcc -DHAVE_CONFIG_H -I
             . -I../../..  -I../../.. -I../../../include -I../../../coregrind -
             I../../../include -I../../../VEX/pub -I../../../VEX/pub -DVGA_amd6
             4=1 -DVGO_linux=1 -DVGP_amd64_linux=1 -DVGPV_amd64_linux_vanilla=1
                 -I../../.. -I../../../include -I../../../coregrind -I../../../
             include -I../../../VEX/pub -I../../../VEX/pub -DVGA_amd64=1 -DVGO_
             linux=1 -DVGP_amd64_linux=1 -DVGPV_amd64_linux_vanilla=1   -ffrees
             tanding -Xassembler -I../../../exp-bbv/tests  -MT complex_rep.o -M
             D -MP -MF $depbase.Tpo -c -o complex_rep.o complex_rep.S &&\
     4142    mv -f $depbase.Tpo $depbase.Po
  >> 4143    gcc: error: million.o: No such file or directory
  >> 4144    gcc: error: fldcw_check.o: No such file or directory
  >> 4145    gcc: error: complex_rep.o: No such file or directory
  >> 4146    gcc: error: rep_prefix.o: No such file or directory
  >> 4147    make[5]: *** [rep_prefix.o] Error 1
     4148    make[5]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
  >> 4149    make[5]: *** [million.o] Error 1
  >> 4150    make[5]: *** [fldcw_check.o] Error 1
  >> 4151    make[5]: *** [complex_rep.o] Error 1
     4152    make[5]: Leaving directory `/tmp/gitlab-runner/spack-stage/spack-s
             tage-valgrind-3.17.0-625uk6prfyg5sjnn4jyz4bfkiqwfdwjp/spack-src/ex
             p-bbv/tests/amd64-linux'
  >> 4153    make[4]: *** [check-am] Error 2
     4154    make[4]: Leaving directory `/tmp/gitlab-runner/spack-stage/spack-s
             tage-valgrind-3.17.0-625uk6prfyg5sjnn4jyz4bfkiqwfdwjp/spack-src/ex
             p-bbv/tests/amd64-linux'
  >> 4155    make[3]: *** [check-recursive] Error 1
     4156    make[3]: Leaving directory `/tmp/gitlab-runner/spack-stage/spack-s
             tage-valgrind-3.17.0-625uk6prfyg5sjnn4jyz4bfkiqwfdwjp/spack-src/ex
             p-bbv/tests'
  >> 4157    make[2]: *** [check-recursive] Error 1
     4158    make[2]: Leaving directory `/tmp/gitlab-runner/spack-stage/spack-s
             tage-valgrind-3.17.0-625uk6prfyg5sjnn4jyz4bfkiqwfdwjp/spack-src/ex
             p-bbv'
  >> 4159    make[1]: *** [check-recursive] Error 1
     4160    make[1]: Leaving directory `/tmp/gitlab-runner/spack-stage/spack-s
             tage-valgrind-3.17.0-625uk6prfyg5sjnn4jyz4bfkiqwfdwjp/spack-src'

See build log for details:
```

title: Test Issue: valgrind
